title: Alexa to Unity in a dumb way : Alexa 2 IFTTT 2 Dropbox 2 Files 2 Unity
description:
Simple trick that is dumb as fuck but help to do action in Unity from Alexa.
Just link IFTTT to dropbox and create a file based on Alexa trigger phrase. Detect the file in Unity and boum :) Hope it helps.
 
Feel free to send me coffee if it did help:  
eloistree.page.link/donation

May the code be with you.
author: Learn By Playing In XR
